items.content:
Hi Cinzia, 


Thanks for submitting a request on Athena for Livestream Consultation service.


1) On your request above, you answered YES to the following question: "Is This Campaign Already Being Supported By A Content/ Editorial/ Live-Ops Team?"

Could you please specify what team is already supporting you with this live stream? 


2) You asked: "The client wants to get OBS permissions this week to check the Live Studio interface. Can I request permissions from Arena now, and then re-apply for it before the show?"

  • Yes, you can apply now for14 days access for LIVE STUDIO access, then re-apply every 14 days for new access. Bear in mind it's not possible to re-apply before the current access is expired. 
  • Why do they asked for LIVE STUDIO access and not OBS LIVE access? Do they prefer going live using the LIVE STUDIO software rather then using 3rd party streaming software? Learn more about the differences on this video guide here


Regards, 

Itay

Hi Itay,


first and foremost, let me clarify, because I filled out the ticket with wrong/misleading info, sorry about that!


1) "Is This Campaign Already Being Supported By A Content/ Editorial/ Live-Ops Team?"

Answer is NO, sorry!


2) "The client wants to get OBS permissions this week to check the Live Studio interface. Can I request permissions from Arena now, and then re-apply for it before the show?"

Here I wanted to say LIVE CENTER - for Miu Miu we have a different person in charge to create the stream key, he never checked the LIVE CENTER interface and want to see it and be prepared BEFORE the show.

Can I apply for OBS now and then re-apply for it in a couple of weeks? Are there any limits in giving OBS permissions twice in a month?  


Hope this help, sorry for the confusion!

Best

Cinzia

Hi Cinzia, 


1) Thank for this clarification. We will support you on this live stream, which is entitled for our 1:1 support (info here). I will create Lark group to provide our support. 


2) OBS LIVE access is granted for 7 days. Yes, you can apply for OBS LIVE access every 7 days. You can reapply only after the last access is expire. Make sure it won't expire on the date of the live stream. 

If your client wish to check the live feature but don't want to go live on their main account, they can create TT account for testing. You can apply for OBS LIVE access for this test account as well. 


Best, 

Itay

Hi Cinzia Vasilache, Here are the metrics for the client's live stream.

Live name: Miu Miu Fall/Winter 2024 Show

Live start time: 2024-03-05 13:36:06

Live end time: 2024-03-05 17:35:19

Unique viewers: 139,805

Total views: 156,097

Top viewer count: 2,842

New followers: 3,102

Likes: 358,873

Comment count: 0

Share: 1,964

Gifts: 0

*These metrics are for the actual live streaming page on TikTok (not the 'For You' page), whether the viewer came from paid campaign or organically.

Thank you for using MPO end-to-end live streaming consultation service. Our support for this live stream has ended. If you have any questions regarding this live stream, please feel free to ask us in the Lark group we used to support this live stream.

We will be happy to support you again in future live stream. Please request our support here

Best regards, 

Itay, MPO LIVE

title: Miu Miu Fashion Show Paris - March 5th at 14:00 CET
